summary: Graduate in Cybersecurity with strong expertise in Java backend development, full stack fundamentals (HTML/CSS/JavaScript; basic React/Angular for UI), and cloud deployments on AWS (Amazon). Solid foundation in Data Structures & Algorithms, Object Oriented Programming (OOP), Object Oriented Design, and the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC). Focused on innovative, cutting edge technology and delivering secure, reliable web applications and user experiences.

education.project: FogSec Cloud Storage - Secure fault-tolerant cloud storage with AES encryption and regenerating codes. Incorporates software design patterns for enhanced functionality.
Backend for encrypted file sharing with role-based auth, Dockerized and CI-ready; supports web applications and user interfaces, aligning with SDLC and programming best practices.

experience.title: Back End Developer
highlights: Supported the backend team during ramp-up through code reviews and foundational class creation (DTOs, entities, interfaces) in Java/Spring Boot
Reviewed merge requests for OOP design, coding standards, and SDLC compliance; resolved SonarQube issues and performed light refactors
Implemented small enhancements and bug fixes in REST APIs (validation, exception handling, logging); verified behavior with Postman
Wrote unit tests and scaffolding with JUnit; increased coverage on touched modules and reduced regressions
Assisted with database tasks: simple MySQL queries/migrations; updated JPA/Hibernate entities to reflect schema changes
Helped maintain CI/CD (Jenkins/Git); fixed failing builds, optimized Maven dependency caching; published artifacts to Nexus
Contributed internal docs (README, runbooks); improved onboarding speed
Containerized local dev with Docker/docker-compose for environment parity and faster teammate setup
Participated in Agile ceremonies (stand-ups, reviews); triaged minor issues in Jira and supported release readiness

experience.title: Cybersecurity Intern
highlights: Assisted in vulnerability scanning, system hardening, and SIEM alert monitoring
Contributed to team brainstorming sessions for security improvements

experience.title: Retail Team Member
highlights: Maintain store operations, inventory, and customer service in high-volume environment, demonstrating strong mobility management skills and global reach capabilities

proficient: AWS (IAM, EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, CloudWatch, Route 53)
